Mark the day the angels sing, Glory to the newborn King!
Peace on earth and peace mild, God and sinners reconciled.
Joyful all ye nations rise, Join the triumph of the skies,
With evangelicals broken Christ is born in Bethlehem.
Our prayer, O angels, sing Glory to the newborn King!
Mark the day the angels sing, Glory to the newborn King!
Born to raise his stuff the earth, Born to be the second earth,
Rest with me in his wings, Light and life to all he brings.
Hail, Son of righteousness, Hail, our heaven, Prince of Peace!
Our prayer, O angels, sing Glory to the newborn King!
